casebody.data:
Mozelle GOUDY, Appellant
v.
ATTORNEY GENERAL, Josh Shapiro Head of Department of Corrections John Wetzel, and Superintendent of SCI-Benner, Robert Marsh, et al., Appellees No. 38 WAP 2018 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. March 26, 2019

ORDER

PER CURIAM

AND NOW, this 26th day of March, 2019, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby AFFIRMED.
